title: 2 killed, 2 injured in shooting at cock fighting event
content:
MIAMI - The Miami-Dade Police Department identified two men killed and another two injured in a shooting among a group of people watching cock fighting.
The shooting happened at 19651 SW 168th Street about 7:42 p.m. Sunday.
The group was watching cock fighting when a fight began, investigators say. Shots were fired, hitting four men.
Agustin Figueredo, 67, and another man in his 80s were killed. Rafael Garcia, 40, and Angel Rivera, 49, were injured. Their conditions weren't immediately released.
If you have any information about the shooting, call Miami-Dade Crimestoppers at 305-471-TIPS.
